# CountAllRecords_withPagingCookies

---

## Trigger

- 手動でフローをトリガーします

## Actions

- アイテム数を0で初期化する

```
{"id":"e6f2610f-29c2-401e-96b5-b8b9438fb5e3","brandColor":"#770BD6","connectionReferences":{"shared_commondataserviceforapps-1":{"connection":{"id":"/ya_sharedcommondataserviceforapps_8800f"}}},"connectorDisplayName":"変数","icon":"data:image/svg+xml;base64,","isTrigger":false,"operationName":"アイテム数を0で初期化する","operationDefinition":{"type":"InitializeVariable","inputs":{"variables":[{"name":"アイテム数","type":"integer","value":0}]},"runAfter":{},"metadata":{"operationMetadataId":"63bb28d1-8a07-448e-a1dd-efe20afc7196"}}}
```

- MoreRecordsをfalseで初期化する

```
{"id":"cf691786-4a5f-4b07-b0df-f2004acd7504","brandColor":"#770BD6","connectionReferences":{"shared_commondataserviceforapps-1":{"connection":{"id":"/ya_sharedcommondataserviceforapps_8800f"}}},"connectorDisplayName":"変数","icon":"data:image/svg+xml;base64,","isTrigger":false,"operationName":"MoreRecordsをfalseで初期化する","operationDefinition":{"type":"InitializeVariable","inputs":{"variables":[{"name":"MoreRecords","type":"boolean","value":false}]},"runAfter":{"アイテム数を0で初期化する":["Succeeded"]},"metadata":{"operationMetadataId":"63bb28d1-8a07-448e-a1dd-efe20afc7196"}}}
```

- ページングCookieを空文字で初期化する

```
{"id":"101775ff-6f2f-4839-9b0d-d2a464396d7e","brandColor":"#770BD6","connectionReferences":{"shared_commondataserviceforapps-1":{"connection":{"id":"/ya_sharedcommondataserviceforapps_8800f"}}},"connectorDisplayName":"変数","icon":"data:image/svg+xml;base64,","isTrigger":false,"operationName":"ページングCookieを空文字で初期化する","operationDefinition":{"type":"InitializeVariable","inputs":{"variables":[{"name":"ページングCookie","type":"string"}]},"runAfter":{"MoreRecordsをfalseで初期化する":["Succeeded"]},"metadata":{"operationMetadataId":"63bb28d1-8a07-448e-a1dd-efe20afc7196"}}}
```

- ページ番号を1で初期化する

```
{"id":"80797871-2809-417d-8b43-f798f347fe13","brandColor":"#770BD6","connectionReferences":{"shared_commondataserviceforapps-1":{"connection":{"id":"/ya_sharedcommondataserviceforapps_8800f"}}},"connectorDisplayName":"変数","icon":"data:image/svg+xml;base64,","isTrigger":false,"operationName":"ページ番号を1で初期化する","operationDefinition":{"type":"InitializeVariable","inputs":{"variables":[{"name":"ページ番号","type":"integer","value":1}]},"runAfter":{"ページングCookieを空文字で初期化する":["Succeeded"]},"metadata":{"operationMetadataId":"63bb28d1-8a07-448e-a1dd-efe20afc7196"}}}
```

- Dataverseコネクタ／100k件超

```
{"id":"e8af229e-fc72-45c7-9296-8e96b56f6804","brandColor":"#8C3900","connectionReferences":{"shared_commondataserviceforapps-1":{"connection":{"id":"/ya_sharedcommondataserviceforapps_8800f"}}},"connectorDisplayName":"制御","icon":"data:image/svg+xml;base64,","isTrigger":false,"operationName":"Dataverseコネクタ／100k件超","operationDefinition":{"type":"Scope","actions":{"Do_until":{"type":"Until","expression":"@equals(variables('MoreRecords'),false)","limit":{"count":400,"timeout":"PT24H"},"actions":{"行を一覧にする":{"type":"OpenApiConnection","inputs":{"host":{"connectionName":"shared_commondataserviceforapps-1","operationId":"ListRecords","apiId":"/providers/Microsoft.PowerApps/apis/shared_commondataserviceforapps"},"parameters":{"entityName":"ya_members","fetchXml":"<fetch page=\"@{variables('ページ番号')}\" @{variables('ページングCookie')}>\n <entity name='ya_member'>\n  <all-attributes/>\n </entity>\n</fetch>"},"MoreRecordsの設定":{"type":"SetVariable","inputs":{"name":"MoreRecords","value":"@if(empty(string(outputs('行を一覧にする')?['body']?['@Microsoft.Dynamics.CRM.morerecords'])), false, outputs('行を一覧にする')?['body']?['@Microsoft.Dynamics.CRM.morerecords'])"},"runAfter":{"行を一覧にする":["Succeeded"]},"description":"if(empty(string(outputs('行を一覧にする')?['body']?['@Microsoft.Dynamics.CRM.morerecords'])), false, outputs('行を一覧にする')?['body']?['@Microsoft.Dynamics.CRM.morerecords'])"},"ページングCookieの設定":{"type":"SetVariable","inputs":{"name":"ページングCookie","value":"paging-cookie=\"@{if(\r\n  empty(\r\n    outputs('行を一覧にする')?['body']?['@Microsoft.Dynamics.CRM.fetchxmlpagingcookie']\r\n  ),\r\n  '',\r\n  replace(\r\n    replace(\r\n      replace(\r\n        decodeUriComponent(\r\n          decodeUriComponent(\r\n            first(\r\n              split(\r\n                last(\r\n                  split(\r\n      )\r\n            )\r\n          )\r\n        ),\r\n        '<',\r\n        '&lt;'\r\n      ),\r\n      '>',\r\n      '&gt;'\r\n    ),\r\n    '\"',\r\n    '&quot;'\r\n  )\r\n)}\""},"runAfter":{"MoreRecordsの設定":["Succeeded"]}},"ページ番号の値を増やす":{"type":"IncrementVariable","inputs":{"name":"ページ番号","value":1},"runAfter":{"ページングCookieの設定":["Succeeded"]}},"アイテム数の値を増やす":{"type":"IncrementVariable","inputs":{"name":"アイテム数","value":"@length(outputs('行を一覧にする')?['body/value'])"},"runAfter":{"ページ番号の値を増やす":["Succeeded"]},"description":"length(outputs('行を一覧にする')?['body/value'])"}},"runAfter":{},"description":"variables('MoreRecords') \nパラメーターのCount・Timeoutを必要に応じて変更"},"件数":{"type":"Compose","inputs":"@variables('アイテム数')","runAfter":{"Do_until":["Succeeded"]},"metadata":{"operationMetadataId":"c013eeb2-4399-40ad-91b6-5875273ac037"}}},"runAfter":{"ページ番号を1で初期化する":["Succeeded"]}}}
```
